NEPProblemType

Determines the type of the nonlinear eigenproblem

Synopsis

typedef enum { NEP_GENERAL=1,
               NEP_RATIONAL     /* NEP defined in split form with all f_i rational */
             } NEPProblemType;

See Also

NEPSetProblemType(), NEPGetProblemType()

Level

intermediate

Location

include/slepcnep.h

Examples
